name: Cage Break
description:
Game is available here: https://dashingdon.com/play/jacic/cage-break/mygame/

(My apologies, there appears to be a compiling error with the software, I will upload a copy to itch.io when it can be resolved but the link above contains the fully playable game.)

Edit: For some reason the itch.io site is not playing nicely with the compiled game. I've provided a download link for anyone who would like it. The game should play fine locally from the downloadable files, alternatively I've left the link above running.

What's a smart, human-savvy cockatoo to do when a group of dastardly bird traffickers come to the forest?

No bars can hold you... Or can they? Make your escape, get your revenge and help the others if you can before it is too late.

This game was created for the 2023 Seed Comp using the "Feathered Fury" prompt by Amanda Walker as inspiration.
